body:
Зарисовки разные

#S_Summers_charather

#S_Summers_зарисовки

#AlexanderGorchakov & Charles de Vilmorin

#OlegKRomanov & Erin Mommsen

~•Страницы забытого дневника•~

Саша странный, чудный. Такой отстраненно-холодный, с малолетства обученный холодному высокомерию. Да ему можно, он же Горчаков, он на целую голову выше остальных и это чувствуется. Даже при мне. Да, я старше его, на два с половиной месяца, но чувствую себя будто ниже, тише.

Он эффектный. В него влюбиться — с головой пропасть, утонуть можно, а он и не посмотрит. Не нужно ему это, совсем не нужно, знает свою цель, да девушкам этим нет рядом с ним места, да и времени на них у Саши тоже нет.

Он серьёзный, серьёзный настолько, что иногда хочется тряхнуть его, вырвать томик из тонких пальцев, что сжимают обложку, да сказать, чтоб веселее был, смеялся хоть иногда.

Гордый. Гордый настолько, что не скажет Ники как сильно, да по уши. Давно уже, все заметили, только князь упрямо мотает головой и вспыхивает раздражённо. “Не лезь”

Но он друг мне, и я этим горжусь. Что при мне он может быть каким угодно, а я… Я просто буду рядом, оставаясь в тени.

summary: It might be my competitive nature...
body:
It might be my competitive nature…

Or my petty ass but seeing Slytherin win the house cup with so many points while the other houses eat my dust fills the embers in my soul.


Like yeah. I’m better than you. Fight me 🔪

tags: Geting the Best of the Gloomilows
title: Fic Rec - HP
body:
Author: zaubernuss


Primary story:

Title: A Kiss for the Netherfairies  

Rating: T

Chapters: 7

Total Word Count: 25.954

Summary: Post-war Hogwarts. One evening, 7th year student Hermione Granger seeks out her Potions Professor in the dungeons. She has an important question to ask. Before, explanations are given, confessions are made, secrets are revealed, forgiveness is asked, memories are shared, truths are being told. In the end, Snape has a decision to make. Could this be a beginning? SS/HG, mostly canon

FF: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12152842/1/A-Kiss-for-the-Netherfairies


Sequel:

Title: Getting the Best of the Gloomilows 

Rating: M

Chapters: 25

Total Word Count: 136.652

Summary: After their life-changing encounter, Severus is adamant that he and Hermione keep their distance until graduation. But how can he turn his back when he finds that Hermione is suffering? Can Occlumency help? A story about healing & finding new perspective. M-rated (to be on the safe side) - for adult themes, descriptions of violence, mild PTSD and sexual content. SS/HG

FF: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12495057/1/Getting-the-Best-of-the-Gloomilows

Like honestly what is the point of putting Harry through the Triwizard...

Like honestly what is the point of putting Harry through the Triwizard Tournament when he could have just had Moody!Crouch kidnap him out of Hogsmeade or give him a portkey some other way there it legit NO REASON to make him a Triwizard champion except that Voldemort is a fucking drama queen

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
Sirius: Oh my god, you're gay.
James: That's very funny.
Sirius: No, no, no, really. There's nothing wrong with that, it's the...
body:
Sirius: Oh my god, you’re gay.

James: That’s very funny.

Sirius: No, no, no, really. There’s nothing wrong with that, it’s the 20th century. Everyone’s gay.

James: Well, are you gay?

Sirius: Fuck no!

James: Well neither am I.

Remus [dryly]: Homophobes.

reblog.comment:

Sirius: Fuck no!

Remus [dryly]: Homophobes.

James: Well, are you gay?

Sirius: Fuck no!

James: Well neither am I.

Remus [dryly]: Homophobes.
trail.content:

James: That’s very funny.

Sirius: No, no, no, really. There’s nothing wrong with that, it’s the 20th century. Everyone’s gay.

James: Well, are you gay?

Sirius: Fuck no!

James: Well neither am I.

Remus [dryly]: Homophobes.
